channel.title: Pages on What's all this, then?
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on What's all this, then?

item.title: About this blog
item.description: This is the newest version of my “Numbers and Shapes” blog, containing material on elementary mathematics, mathematics education, software, and anything else that takes my fancy. It is created in Hugo, a static blog engine which is blindingly fast, and works by simply serving up static html files (along with any necessary javascript). There is no database, and far less to fiddle with than with wordpress. Because it is static there is less opportunity for user input (such as comments) but that’s not an issue for me, as about 99.

item.title: Pictures
item.description: This page will contain various photos and snapshots. New Zealand, 2018: First, from a holiday taken by my wife and me through the South Island of New Zealand early in 2018: New Zealand 2018 Taiwan, 2017: From a conference in Taiwan (Taoyuan City mainly, but also in Taipei and including a visit to Keelung City) in December 2017: Taiwan 2017 Shanghai, December 2015: I spent several wonderful days here en route to a conference.
